template<typename _T>
class ThQueue< _T >

Member Function Documentation

template<typename _T >
bool ThQueue< _T >::Add ( const _T &  value  )  [inline]

public methods

this is a simple interface for adding and removing items from the queue. This isn't as efficient, but it's easier to use.

try to begin adding the item.

copy the value.

all done.

return true to indicate success.

Definition at line 173 of file ThQueue.h.

template<typename _T >
const ThSignal& ThQueue< _T >::GetMessageSignal (  )  const [inline]

returns the message signal. It is raised when a message is ready to be removed, and lowered when one is not.
